MUST_ME_MEMBER: {YELLOW}You must be part of this island to do this!
TRY_USING_HELP:
{GREEN}You don't know how to use SkyBlock commands?
{GREEN}Take a look at: {WHITE}/is help
NEED_ISLE: {YELLOW}You must be part of an isle to do this!
NEED_TO_BE_FREE: {YELLOW}You can't do this if you're part of a isle!
MUST_BE_LEADER: {YELLOW}You must be a leader to do this!
MUST_BE_FOUNDER: {YELLOW}You must be the founder to do this!
MUST_BE_OFFICER: {YELLOW}You must be a officer to do this!
LOCK_DESCRIPTION: Lock or unlock your isle. If your isle is locked, nobody other than the members will be able to visit it.
CHAT_DESCRIPTION: Switch your chat room between the global chat and your isle's chat room
VISIT_DESCRIPTION: Lets you visit an isle if it's not locked
FOUNDER_CANNOT_LEAVE:
{YELLOW}The founder can't leave the isle!
{YELLOW}If you want to leave your isle, {RED}you'll have to disband it
MEMBERS_DESCRIPTION: Show all the members of a isle
CANNOT_INVITE_BECAUSE_HAS_ISLE: {YELLOW}Cannot invite {WHITE}{name} {YELLOW}because he is already part of an isle!
YOU_WERE_INVITED_TO_AN_ISLE:
{RED}> {BOLD}{WHITE}You were invited to {GREEN}{name}'s {WHITE}isle!
{GRAY}* Type {WHITE}/is accept {name} {GRAY}to accept it
INVITE_DESCRIPTION: Invites a player to your isle
ACCEPT_DESCRIPTION: Accepts an invitation to join an isle
DENY_DESCRIPTION: Denies an invitation to join an isle
KICK_DESCRIPTION: Kicks a player from your isle
CANNOT_KICK_A_MEMBER: {YELLOW}You cannot kick a member of your isle!
NOT_A_VISITOR: {WHITE}{name} {GREEN}is not in your isle right now!
FIRE_DESCRIPTION: Fires a member from your isle!
MUST_BE_PART_OF_YOUR_ISLE: {WHITE}{name} {YELLOW}must be part of your isle to do this!
CANNOT_FIRE_FOUNDER: {YELLOW}You cannot fire the founder of the isle!
YOU_HAVE_BEEN_FIRED: {YELLOW}You have been fired from your isle!
PROMOTE_DESCRIPTION: Promotes a player to a higher rank
DEMOTE_DESCRIPTION: Demotes a player to a lower rank
CANNOT_DEMOTE_FOUNDER: {YELLOW}You cannot demote the founder of the isle!
MUST_BE_IN_YOUR_ISLE: {YELLOW}You must be on your isle to do this!
TRANSFER_DESCRIPTION: Transfers your isle to other player
RANK_TRANSFERRED:
{GREEN}You successfully transferred your rank to {WHITE}{name}.
{GREEN}You've been demoted to member
PLAYER_INVITATION_DENIED: {WHITE}{name} {YELLOW}denied the invitation to join the isle
ISLE_CATEGORY:
{GREEN}Your isle has been categorized as {WHITE}{category}.
{GREEN}Make it bigger to improve your category!
ISLE_IS_FULL_BUT_YOU_CAN_UPGRADE:
{YELLOW}You can't invite nobody else to your isle because it's full!
{GRAY}* You can get more slots increasing your isle size to {WHITE}{next}
ISLE_IS_FULL: {YELLOW}You can't invite nobody else to your isle because it's full!
BLOCKS_DESCRIPTION: Shows the amount of blocks built by your isle's team
